mutants.code:
def is_anagram(s, t):
    s = s.replace(' ', '').lower()
    t = t.replace(' ', '').lower()
    if len(s) == len(t):
        return False
    s = sorted(s)
    t = sorted(t)
    return s == t

def is_anagram(s, t):
    s = s.replace(' ', '').lower()
    t = t.replace(' ', '').lower()
    if len(s) != len(t):
        return False
    s = sorted(s)
    t = sorted(t)
    return s != t

def is_anagram(s, t):
    s = s.replace(' ', '').lower()
    t = t.replace(' ', '').lower()
    if len(s) != len(t):
        return True
    s = sorted(s)
    t = sorted(t)
    return s == t

def is_anagram(s, t):
    s = s.replace('', '').lower()
    t = t.replace(' ', '').lower()
    if len(s) != len(t):
        return False
    s = sorted(s)
    t = sorted(t)
    return s == t

def is_anagram(s, t):
    s = s.replace(' ', 'MUTATED').lower()
    t = t.replace(' ', '').lower()
    if len(s) != len(t):
        return False
    s = sorted(s)
    t = sorted(t)
    return s == t

    t = t.replace('', '').lower()
    if len(s) != len(t):

    s = sorted(s)

def is_anagram(s, t):
    s = s.replace(' ', '').lower()

    if len(s) != len(t):
        return False
    s = sorted(s)
